data.lyric:
[ti:fake smile (Explicit)]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]fake smile (Explicit) - Ariana Grande (爱莉安娜·格兰德)
[00:00.59]Lyrics by：Andrew Wansel/Nathan Perez/Priscilla Renea/Kennedi Lykken/Justin Tranter/Ariana Grande/Joseph W. Frierson/Mary Lou Frierson
[00:01.19]Composed by：Andrew Wansel/Nathan Perez/Priscilla Renea/Kennedi Lykken/Justin Tranter/Ariana Grande/Joseph W. Frierson/Mary Lou Frierson
[00:01.78]After laughter comes tears
[00:11.75]After laughter comes tears
[00:23.24]Another night another party sayin' hi to everybody
[00:27.62]I'm sorry it's time to leave I gotta leave now
[00:30.90]Got somewhere I gotta be now I'm starving
[00:34.27]Can somebody walk me to my car
[00:36.33]If I go alone I'm not gon' make it very far
[00:39.12]I'm happy for the love and all of the above
[00:41.91]If I'm being honest I done been through way too much
[00:44.68]I can't fake another smile
[00:47.64]I can't fake like I'm alright
[00:50.29]Ooh ah ooh ah
[00:55.93]And I won't say I'm feeling fine
[00:58.96]After what I been through I can't lie
[01:01.69]Ooh ah ooh ah
[01:07.06]F**k a fake smile smile
[01:12.90]F**k a fake smile fake smile
[01:19.66]I read the things they write about me
[01:21.87]Hear what they're sayin' on the TV it's crazy
[01:25.28]It's gettin' hard for them to shock me
[01:27.43]But every now and then it's shocking don't blame me
[01:30.73]I know it's the life that I chose
[01:32.74]But baby I'm grateful I want you to know
[01:35.55]I'm happy for the love and all of the above
[01:38.32]If I'm being honest I done been through way too much
[01:41.27]I can't fake another smile
[01:44.01]I can't fake like I'm alright
[01:46.87]Ooh ah ooh ah
[01:52.35]And I won't say I'm feeling fine
[01:55.43]After what I been through I can't lie
[01:58.15]Ooh ah ooh ah
[02:03.58]F**k a fake smile smile
[02:09.40]F**k a fake smile fake smile
[02:16.04]If I'm hurt I ain't gon' lie about it
[02:18.76]Arms crossed with the attitude lips pouted
[02:21.43]If I'm mad I ain't gon' lie about it
[02:24.29]Neck roll with the attitude yuh
[02:27.02]If I'm hurt I ain't gon' lie about it
[02:29.96]Arms crossed pouted
[02:32.77]If I'm mad I ain't gon' lie about it
[02:35.53]Neck roll with the attitude yuh
[02:37.73]I can't fake another smile and I can't fake
[02:42.09]I can't fake like I'm alright no smile
[02:43.29]Ooh ah ooh ah ooh
[02:48.88]And I won't say I'm feeling fine I'm feeling fine
[02:52.42]After what I been through I can't lie
[02:54.60]Ooh ah ooh ah
[03:00.10]F**k a fake smile smile
[03:05.90]F**k a fake smile fake smile yuh
data.trans:
[ti:fake smile (Explicit)]
[ar:Ariana Grande]
[al:thank u, next (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.59]//
[00:01.18]//
[00:01.78]乐极生悲
[00:11.75]乐极生悲
[00:23.24]又一个夜晚 又一场派对 向每个人打招呼
[00:27.62]抱歉 我得走了 我要离开了
[00:30.90]我马上得去一个地方 我饿死了
[00:34.27]有人陪我去开车吗
[00:36.33]如果我一个人去 我可能走不了多远
[00:39.12]谢谢你们的爱 谢谢你们给的一切
[00:41.91]说实话 我真的已经受够了
[00:44.68]我无法再强颜欢笑
[00:47.64]我不能装作自己安然无恙
[00:50.29]//
[00:55.93]我也不会说我感觉还好
[00:58.96]经历了这么多 我不能再说谎
[01:01.69]//
[01:07.06]去他的强颜欢笑
[01:12.90]去他的强颜欢笑 强颜欢笑
[01:19.66]我看过那些写我的文章
[01:21.87]在电视上听过他们对我的看法 难以置信
[01:25.28]想要撼动我可没那么容易
[01:27.43]但我偶尔还是会动摇 别怪我
[01:30.73]我知道这就是我选择的生活
[01:32.74]但是 宝贝 我很感激 希望你知道
[01:35.55]谢谢你们的爱 谢谢你们给的一切
[01:38.32]说实话 我真的已经受够了
[01:41.27]我无法再强颜欢笑
[01:44.01]我不能装作自己安然无恙
[01:46.87]//
[01:52.35]我也不会说我感觉还好
[01:55.43]经历了这么多 我不能再说谎
[01:58.15]//
[02:03.58]去他的强颜欢笑
[02:09.40]去他的强颜欢笑 强颜欢笑
[02:16.04]如果我难过 我不会撒谎说不难过
[02:18.76]双手交叉 故作姿态 撅着嘴唇
[02:21.43]如果我生气 我不会撒谎说不生气
[02:24.29]仰起脑袋 故作姿态
[02:27.02]如果我难过 我不会撒谎说不难过
[02:29.96]双手交叉 故作姿态 撅着嘴唇
[02:32.77]如果我生气 我不会撒谎说不生气
[02:35.53]生气的转过脸去
[02:37.73]我无法再强颜欢笑 我无法假装
[02:42.09]我不能装作自己安然无恙 不再假笑
[02:43.29]//
[02:48.88]我也不会说我感觉还好 我感觉还好
[02:52.42]经历了这么多 我不能再说谎
[02:54.60]//
[03:00.10]去他的强颜欢笑
[03:05.90]去他的强颜欢笑 强颜欢笑
